title: Spanish News, Insights, Onboarding
description: Cardano education and resources for everyday people are few and far between in any language. The gap is even wider for Spanish Speakers.
solution: Library of original educational articles and news in Spanish, to include Cardano basics, current events, and insights for newcomers.
experience: 14+ Yrs Software & Cloud Engineering, Blockchain development, business consulting, world languages, technical writing, teaching.
